author: henning
msg: Fix up unit tests to work again using ant.

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix a bug in control generation that allows a control interface and implementation to be stored in the default package.  This required two fixes:
- adding isRootPackage methods to the JavaBeans used for Velocity code generation
- adding Velocity that checks the isRootPackage on the ControlBean / Info / ImplInitializer and only generates the package name if isRootPackage returns false

author: rgrabowski
msg: Changed implementation to use ILogger instead of ILog for calling methods.

author: hlship
msg: Change the build scripts to allow for test case classes ending in "Test", and to output source with the JavaDoc
